Sentencas: Y and Sr co-doped ceria (Ce0.8 + xY0.2 -2xSrxO1.9) samples which have the fixed oxygen vacancies concentrations, were synthesized by a gel combustion method followed by the common ceramic preparation process, and the effect of co-doping on the ionic conductivity was investigated.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: XRD results confirmed cubic fluorite structure in the samples.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The lattice constant increases with increasing Sr content, and different strains of the compressive strain and the tensile strain exist in different samples.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The sintered samples with the relative density of about 92% showed well defined grains, good densification with few closed pores.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The activation energies of co-doped ceria decreased, reached a minimum and then increased with the increasing of Sr2+ concentration.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of co-doped ceria increased with increasing Sr2+ doping concentration, reached a maximum and then decreased at higher doping level.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The variation of the ionic conductivity and the activation energy with increasing Sr2+ doping concentration can be attributed to the different strain state in samples.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The activation energy reached a minimum value and conductivity reached a maximum value for YSDC-05.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte

Sentencas: The conductivity of YSDC-05 at 600 degrees C, 700 degrees C and 800 degrees C reached 0.0058 S.cm(-1), 0.0088 S.cm(-1) and 0.0099 S.cm(-1), respectively.
Titulo: Lattice strain dependent on ionic conductivity of Ce0.8 + xY0.2 - 2xSrxO1.9 (x=0-0.08) electrolyte
